name: unhinged
description: LLM-native system with document store and agent orchestration

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.dev:frontend: npm run validate:generated && cd frontend && npm start
scripts.dev:backend: npm run validate:generated && cd backend && npm run dev
scripts.build:frontend: npm run build:proto && cd frontend && npm run build
scripts.build:backend: npm run build:proto && cd backend && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.test:frontend: npm run validate:generated && cd frontend && npm test
scripts.test:backend: npm run validate:generated && cd backend && npm test

author: Unhinged Team
